title: Van der Poel Stomps (Again) as Collision with Fan Ends Van Aert’s Podium Hopes
content:
Saddle problems, a crash with a fan, and infernal mud made for a wild race in the first face-off of the cyclocross season between Van Aert and Van der Poel.

Read the full article at Van der Poel Stomps (Again) as Collision with Fan Ends Van Aert’s Podium Hopes on Velo.
author: ahood
